actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Great Lakes Pilotage Act of 1960 in order to relieve the restrictive qualification standards for U.S. registered pilots on the Great Lakes.

summary.text: Amends the Great Lakes Pilotage Act of 1960 to remove the requirement that a United States registered pilot hold an unlimited master's license.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Great Lakes Pilotage Act of 1960 in order to relieve the restrictive qualification standards for U.S. registered pilots on the Great Lakes.
